items.content_html: File Viewer is a lightweight Node.js app for quick file uploads and instant previews of text-based files (.txt, .js, .php, .css). Ideal for developers managing plugins, small projects, or AI tools. Enables seamless code inspection, directory navigation, and efficient copy-paste operations, enhancing productivity and workflow optimization.
